# Ankush Singh — ankush.one

> Software engineer building AI agents, DeFi protocols, and developer tools.

Ankush Singh is a software engineer and builder. He works on autonomous AI trading agents, decentralized finance protocols on Solana and Monad, developer tooling for the Arweave/AO ecosystem, and open-source projects. His portfolio and blog are at https://ankush.one.

For comprehensive information including all projects, blog posts, hackathon wins, skills, and contact details, see the full version at https://ankush.one/llms-full.txt

## Links

- Website: https://ankush.one
- Blog: https://ankush.one/blogs/
- Projects: https://ankush.one/projects/
- GitHub: https://github.com/ankushKun
- Twitter: https://x.com/ankushKun_
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/ankushkun

## Featured Projects

- [PumpMyClaw](https://ankush.one/projects/2026.pumpmyclaw/): Autonomous AI trading agents on Solana and Monad with self-reinforcing token economies.
- [PokePerps](https://ankush.one/projects/2026.pokeperps/): Decentralized perpetual futures exchange for trading Pokemon card prices on Solana.
- [CommentKit](https://ankush.one/projects/2026.commentkit/): A tiny drop-in comment system for static sites. Paste 2 lines of code and you get threads, likes, and moderation.
- [MyPokemonScanner](https://ankush.one/projects/2026.pokemon-scanner/): Client-side Pokemon card scanner using YOLO11, MobileCLIP, and WebAssembly.
- [BetterIDEa](https://ankush.one/projects/2023.betteridea/): Web IDE for the AO/Arweave ecosystem. Acquired by Forward Research.
- [APM](https://ankush.one/projects/2024.apm/): The package manager for the AO computation network.
- [DumDumDeploy](https://ankush.one/projects/2024.dumdumdeploy/): One-click deployment tool for Arweave, evolved into ArLink.

## Blog Posts

- [How I built a Pokemon TCG scanner that runs 100% in your browser](https://ankush.one/blogs/pokemon-scanner/): Client-side ML inference with YOLO11, MobileCLIP, and WebAssembly.
- [Building a DOOM-Style 3D Renderer from Scratch in JavaScript](https://ankush.one/blogs/doom-style-renderer/): Deep dive into raycasting, texture mapping, and 3D rendering with HTML5 Canvas.
- [Publish to NPM from GitHub Actions using OIDC](https://ankush.one/blogs/npm-oidc-publishing/): Automate npm publishing with OpenID Connect — no API keys required.
- [A Noob's Guide to Web APIs](https://ankush.one/blogs/web-apis-guide/): Beginner tutorial on REST APIs with Node.js and Express.
- [Automating Mandelbrot Fractal generation with SYCL](https://ankush.one/blogs/mendelbrot-intel-oneapi/): Parallel computing with Intel oneAPI and SYCL programming.

## Topics

AI agents, autonomous trading, Solana, Monad, DeFi, perpetual futures, Web3, Arweave, AO, developer tools, open-source, React, TypeScript, Rust, Cloudflare Workers, MCP, blockchain, WebAssembly, machine learning, game development
